website_summaries.verdict: This basic LED exit sign includes a battery backup for emergency situations, and is a good option for smaller rooms or businesses.
pros: Lack of headlights on this model is not a problem in locations with a short distance from work space to doorway, where visibility is less of an issue
Battery backup ensures the sign remains illuminated during a power loss
Installation of the battery backup and the unit itself is simple
Unit includes an indicator light for tracking battery charge level
cons: The battery backup on this unit will lose charge quickly compared to other units

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a consumer (I thought it'd be cool for my room) thinking there was an AC adapter ...
customer_reviews.text: Please keep in mind that you need an electrician to install this, or you need to know what you're doing. I bought this as a consumer (I thought it'd be cool for my room) thinking there was an AC adapter included. I feel stupid now, but it still looks awesome in my room even if it's not on.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best Value Exit Sign!
customer_reviews.text: This exit sign works surprisingly well. It is fairly easy to install, the only issue is the openings to feed the wires through are very small so it can get a little difficult. The sign is very bright and can be seen from a good distance. It definitely gets your attention. I would say its surprisingly bright. Its by far the least expensive exit sign available that will satisfy the fire marshal. Its LED so you will never have to worry about replacing bulbs again. The backup battery is a single rechargeable AA battery that is 700 mAh. It's made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Tbird365

customer_reviews.title: easy to install, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: similar product (but without battery backup) costs more than 2x more at local big box hardware. These signs are pretty easy to install both wall and ceiling mounted (though you may have to drill your own holes in the plastic for wall mount depending on the mounting surface). I've installed 7 of these signs. The only one that had problems was quickly replaced by the seller. And I spent the same per sign as the cost of a few changes of those ridiculous incandescent bulbs in the old signs. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: W. Overton

customer_reviews.title: Very nice exit sign!!!
customer_reviews.text: This exit sign is very well made. Unlike most other exit signs, that are made of a bad plastic and break easily, this is made of a hard, durable plastic. It was very easy to install and when you first plug the included battery, it turns on right away even if you have the power disconnected. Very great exit, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: NoelleNelson

customer_reviews.title: Bum battery
customer_reviews.text: Sign arrived as expected, good quality, easy to mount, but the battery backup pack lasted for about an hour. The battery backup feature was the reason I chose this sign in particular. I have considered ordering two more of these signs but, I don't want to have to spend another $30-50 replacing the battery packs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exit Lights Light UP
customer_reviews.text: All of the exit lights work just fine they came with the mounting hardware and even have the arrows if you need them for direction. I bought a lot of these and all of them light up and they look good... These lights were a great value for the 2 pack...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The new units are very bright and were easy to install because the jumper wires sent in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I removed all 4 of the old units and INSTALLED the 4 new ones in a little under 2 hours. The new units are very bright and were easy to install because the jumper wires sent in the kit made the job easy. I had one face mask that busted when I was trying to remove one of the side < but I had a extra face mask. Seems to be a very good unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Professionalism
customer_reviews.text: The purpose of this purchase (eTopLighting LED Exit Sign Emergency Light Lighting Emergency LED Light) was to add to a series of add-ons to complete my small company's first professional animation/video-programming/film-editing/chroma-key/recording studio. I will definitely purchase more for the second professional animation/video-programming/film-editing/chroma-key/recording studio as I expand to feature multiple studio rooms within one setting. Lorenzo Morgan Jr.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo Morgan Jr

customer_reviews.title: The product mentions an option to mount at the back ...
customer_reviews.text: The product mentions an option to mount at the back by punching out "knockouts". However, there are no knockouts on the back panel of the signs that allow them to fasten to the supplied mounts. I ordered three of these, all the same, no knockouts. The only way to mount them directly to the wall from the back is to screw through the plastic directly into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: F. Garner

customer_reviews.title: Decent Exit Lights
customer_reviews.text: These are decent exit lights. Our maintenance man likes them here at our church. The only issue we have had is that on a couple of occasions the lights do not work and need to be returned. The return is easy enough, the hassle being that our maintenance guy has to take them back down so they can be returned and then put the old one back in while we wait for the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: BrianAZ

customer_reviews.title: cheap quality; fixtures died in only 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality; died right after 90 day warranty expired. I purchased many of these for an office property since LED lights should last for several years; 4 fixtures out of 30 were already dead in 4 months' time. Don't waste your money. Company did nothing to resolve since it was just past Amazon's 90 day return policy. Two thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: GBG

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I mean what’s to review... it works, you won’t get fined if this is for work, and that’s it
customer_reviews.author: Akshay Patel

customer_reviews.title: Update: ordered five more
customer_reviews.text: The conventional light bulbs in our exits signs were always burning out. With six signs and 4 little bulbs each, the signs were an annoying task to keep up with. When the fire inspector shows up, he always finds something to say about the dim light coming from our old signs. We ordered an eToplighting LED Exit sign as a test. We are very satisfied. We expect the LEDs will last longer than the conventional bulbs. The unit does include a battery backup. We will be ordering 5 more to replace all of our signs. Very satisfied with the sign we bought, so we are completing the installation of these signs at all of our exits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they are easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I have installed six of them. they are easy to install, look good and are plenty bright. The packing on these and quality is better than another exit sign I bought with the same model number. I was surprised to see this difference with the same model number, they were similar but not as big or good.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Brown

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the 4 pack - got a 2 pack
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 4 pack and only received a 2 pack.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Was tired of replacing the bulbs on my exit light constantly in my office waiting room. It wasn't hard to install and the bulbs should last forever without replacement. Color and brightness was better than the old incandescent one.
customer_reviews.author: G Bennett

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: I had to have an electrician install them, but they work great. There were ZERO instructions on installing, but they are up just cost a little more to have them put in.
customer_reviews.author: Lady of Blackjack

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and works fine. We bought around 15 and had no problem
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and works fine. We bought around 15 and had no problem. However, this fixture is different from previous ones, so needed to use brains a lot to install properly. But it's a good product compare to the price.
customer_reviews.author: flaming fire

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, bright and unobtrusive.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Bright, visible and sleek.an upgrade from the dated signs I had in my commercial building. After a recent minor fire, smoke filled the halls I realized how important it was to have well-lit exits
customer_reviews.author: TulipMadness

customer_reviews.title: Just as described with great price
customer_reviews.text: I installed these and they work great. Price is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller than I expected but it looks good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Exit Lights.
customer_reviews.text: These are great signs at a great price. Light duty as you should expect at this price but they work great, are easy to install and energy efficient. They were cheaper than just buying bulbs and batteries for the old Exit signs!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Nowotny

customer_reviews.title: Great product at great price. Comes with everything needed. Passed fire inspection.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my restaurant because my existing sign had broken led bulbs. Installation was a breeze (simple black and red wires) with included mounting hardware and backup battery. Includes arrows for left, right, both, or none. Passed fire inspection with no problems. Simple and nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel K

customer_reviews.title: Great price, Works Great, Meets all code requirements.
customer_reviews.text: These are great exit signs and a tremendous price for a retail environment. They meet fire code and are super easy to install. They have a battery backup and a test light to ensure that the regular battery doesn't need to be replaced. 5 minute installation or $30/sign for an electrician to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wroblewski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great light, much cheaper then buying a new battery. Works well no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased...had to hire an electrician to install but I expected that.
customer_reviews.author: Luv4leggeds

customer_reviews.title: they are happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for the company I work for ... they are happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Ai K.

customer_reviews.title: Even the small bolts provided fit good.
customer_reviews.text: It works well with battery backup function. I could replace the old one attached on the ceiling smoothly using parts provided. Even the small bolts provided fit good.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kim

customer_reviews.title: Best product in this category for the price...
customer_reviews.text: A descent product for the price... Very easy to install - no issues (with the assumption you are able to wire the sign into existing electricity). Functions as described - met building code for the commercial installation I used the product for. I found no reason not to give this product a 5-star rating. Similar products I've used at higher prices added no additional value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Batteries literally died the same day I installed this at work
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: A great replacement!
customer_reviews.text: These were a great replacement to four old exit lights with incandescent light bulbs that were ALWAYS burning out. They are very bright and are powered by one row of RED LED's at the bottom of the sign.

customer_reviews.title: This way to the Egress
customer_reviews.text: Piece of cake installation. If you have ever installed a lighting fixture, you can do this. Lightweight, LED lights, cheap, looks as good as any other - what's not to like?

customer_reviews.title: These exit signs are easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These exit signs are easy to install. I am replacing old heavy cast iron signs which ni - cad batteries are no longer working. These exit lights are lightweight and very bright, They have battery backup in case of power outage and has a test button to check that the backup battery is working. It also has optional mounting instructions and extra lens cover for two way use.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: These work great and the price was less then replacing the sealed batter in the older units.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for my old exit lights.

customer_reviews.title: Great item.

customer_reviews.title: Least expensive Exit sign and does what it is supposed ...
customer_reviews.text: Least expensive Exit sign and does what it is supposed to. You can choose between 120V or 277V hook up (make sure you test your voltage and connect this correctly). Also comes with mounting plates for many mounting options.

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product for the price! Had these installed on recommendation of the local fire chief. Look good and easy to install for my electrician.

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: It came with pedestal for top and side mount. It also has the double sided Exit plates for hall mounting.

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a great price point
customer_reviews.text: From the item description - "Ceiling/back/side mountable(easy snap-fit canopy included)". My unit did NOT include the canopy for ceiling mounting, which is what i needed to install this in an acoustical ceiling. My project is slated for completion this weekend and this was the last component needed, now I've got to try and source a new item and be able to get it in time to install this weekend. The price of the unit itself is great, but thats besides the point if the description is misleading and I cant use it... Edit - After removing the front cover of the sign, i found the ceiling canopy inside of the unit. worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey K

customer_reviews.title: Looks perfect, dont expect this to be something you just ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks perfect, dont expect this to be something you just screw the back to a wall it is side or top screwed. The battery in it is a non removable one and is ment to be used with actual electrical wires
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Exit signs
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed at our church building. At the hardware stores these were ridiculously expensive like 50 or 60 dollars each. We ordered 10 of these for the price of 3 of the ones at the store. These are great very bright and were easy to install.

customer_reviews.title: Excellant Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with basic electrical knowledge. Must be hard wired. Everything that is needed is included. Battery, brackets, and faceplates for various applications and situations.

customer_reviews.text: Best deal around. After replacing bulbs in my old signs about every 3 months, those days are gone. I love these and the price is great!

product_meta.title: eTopLighting LED Exit Sign Emergency Light Lighting Emergency LED Light/Battery Back-up/Red Letter, AGG745
product_meta.description:
Size:1PACK

Application
Ideal for commercial, industrial facilities where economy,
appearance, and the ultimate ease of installation and maintenance
are desired. Also, solid-state electronics to offer both reliability
and low cost performance.

Features
Dimension: 12.3 x 7.5 x 1.7 Inch
Completely Self-contained
Fully Automatic Operation
Compact / Low Profile Design
Long Lifespan Battery: AA NiCAD 3.6V
Low Voltage Disconnected(LVD) Battery Protection
120/277V Operation
Freev 110V to 347V(Optional)
Universal Size Mounting Device
LED Lamp Lifespan over 25 Years
SDT Self Diagnostic(Optional)
V-5/Flame Retardant/High Impact
Energy Consumption less than 2 Watts
UL924 ETL Listed/Damp Location Listed
feature_bullets: 🎁Red Letter LED Emergency Exit Indicator Light, AA NiCad Long Lifespan Battery
🎇 Material : Plastic, Size : 12.3 x 7.5 x 1.7 Inch, Low-Cost performance
👍 Wet location listed ETL approved, safe and reliable.
🙌 This luminaire can be used in a 120V or 277V circuit for use at home, commercial and industrial lighting.
⭐ Note: Battery is integrated with the product and used for backup not for continuous power source

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars355 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
